name: Mental Tandem Beta
description:
Important! (This game can only be played with two xbox 360 or xbox one controllers for now).

Mental Tandem its an endless 2 Player Cooperative game where you have to survive as much as you can on a dimensional portal where you have been abducted.

In this game you play as Sam-Ned, a combination of 2 astronaut friends that where mixed together when they where abducted.

Each player controls one half of the character, this means you will have to syncronize and cooperate in order to survive.
